mapper.sql: id, title, description, lecturer_id, location, start_time, end_time, capacity, status, create_time, update_time,cover_url
mapper.select: SELECT u.nickname as user_name, u.phone, DATE_FORMAT(r.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reserve_time, CASE r.status WHEN 1 THEN '已签到' ELSE '未签到' END as check_in_status, DATE_FORMAT(r.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as check_in_time FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = r.student_id WHERE r.lecture_id = #{lectureId} ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
